content.en: AI in gaming: Computer game playing addresses the fundamental issues in artificial intelligence by using techniques such as Finite-State Transition Networks, rule-based systems, and search algorithms. The AAAI competition on general game playing incorporates various AI technologies, while computational intelligence methods are applied to games for challenges and opportunities. Game playing research focuses on identifying and developing successful algorithmic foundations, covering areas such as NPC behavior learning, search and planning, and player modeling.
content.da: AI i spil: Computerspil adresserer de grundlæggende problemstillinger inden for kunstig intelligens ved hjælp af teknikker som finit-tilstand overgangsnetværk, regelbaserede systemer og søgealgoritmer. AAAI-konkurrencen inden for generel spilafvikling inkorporerer forskellige AI-teknologier, mens beregningsintelligensmetoder anvendes på spil for at skabe udfordringer og muligheder. Forskning i spilafvikling fokuserer på at identificere og udvikle succesfulde algoritmiske fundamenter, der dækker områder som NPC-adfærdsindlæring, søgning og planlægning samt spiller-modellering.
